Title: By the Pricking of My Thumbs
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Ira Steven Behr (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Tobias Menzies, Gary Lewis
Plot: Jamie hopes the Duke of Sandringham can help remove the price on his head.
